H0.text: Wood burning is an example of a physical change.

H1.text: Iron rusting is an example of a physical change.

H2.text: Ice melting is an example of a physical change.

H3.text: Milk souring is an example of a physical change.

A4.text: Many elements and some compounds change from solids to liquids and from liquids to gases when heated and the reverse when cooled.

A5.text: Physical changes are changes affecting the form of a chemical substance, but not its chemical composition.
